name: Mission in Snowdriftland - Snowlogue
description:
Mission in Snowdriftland – Snowlogue is the Free to Play version of Mission in Snowdriftland. With 3 playable levels, you’ll be able to accompany the fearless snowboy Chubby Snow in a classic platformer paired with 2D pixel graphics!



Chubby first saw the light of day 15 years ago. Back in 2006, Mission in Snowdriftland was an online advent calendar including 24 challenging levels.



In 2021, Chubby is back and ready to complete his Mission in Snowdriftland! Now you can enjoy the long forgotten 2D platformer advent calendar again during the cold winter days...and also anytime you want of course. With Mission in Snowdriftland – Snowlogue you’ll get a sneak peek of the full game coming Winter 2021.

FEATURES

This free Snowlogue version of Mission in Snowdriftland includes:

  • 3 levels
  • Retro music
  • Pixel art as we all love it
  • 60 fps support (and higher)
  • Full gamepad support
  • High resolution in full screen
  • Speedrun timer
  • Achievements

Chubby is on his mission again...what about you?
